items.title: Van de Ven gesteund: 'Doet een verdediger dat niet, is hij geen verdediger'
items.summary: Tottenham Hotspur-manager Thomas Frank is het niet eens met de lezing van Liverpool-coach Arne Slot in de blessurezaak van Alexander Isak. Slot noemde de sliding van Micky van de Ven een 'roekeloze actie' , dat ziet Frank anders.

items.summary: Liverpool head coach says Isak out for â€˜couple of monthsâ€™ Spurs counterpart says â€˜true defendersâ€™ have to challenge Thomas Frank has hit back at Arne Slot after the Liverpool head coach criticised Micky van de Ven for a â€œrecklessâ€ challenge that left Alexander Isak with a fractured leg. Frank said Van de Venâ€™s attempt to prevent Isak from scoring in Liverpoolâ€™s 2-1 win at Tottenham was the â€œnatural reactionâ€ of a true defender and that his player had spoken to the Sweden international to apologise. items.title: Isak facing two months out after 'reckless' tackle - Slot
items.summary: Liverpool manager Arne Slot says Alexander Isak faces "a couple of months" out injured after a "reckless" challenge by Tottenham defender Micky van de Ven.

items.title: Slot calls tackle 'reckless'; Isak out 2 months
items.summary: Liverpool head coach Arne Slot has described the challenge from Tottenham Hotspur defender Micky van de Ven which broke Alexander Isak's leg as "reckless."

items.title: Newcastle contact refs' boss over Chelsea call
items.summary: Newcastle United have contacted referees' chief Howard Webb over the controversial decision which denied them a potentially crucial penalty against Chelsea.

items.title: Sources: Man Utd delay Zirkzee exit decision
items.summary: Manchester United are set to delay any decision on Joshua Zirkzee's future until later in the January window, sources have told ESPN.

items.title: Rapids hire Tottenham assistant Wells as coach
items.summary: The Colorado Rapids hired Tottenham Hotspur assistant Matt Wells as coach to replace Chris Armas.

items.title: How will Liverpool cope without Isak?
items.summary: BBC Sport analyses how Liverpool manager Arne Slot might set up following striker Alexander Isak being ruled out for about two months with a broken leg.

items.title: Kijkje in de ziel van Wout Weghorst: portret van een eigenzinnige streber
items.summary: Ajax heeft een studieobject in de aanval. Aan de talkshowtafels werden in 2025 aan geen Eredivisie-voetballer zoveel uren besteed als aan selfmade spits Wout Weghorst. Inspiratie- en irritatiebron ineen.

items.title: NFL Pro Bowl teams announced Kelce earns 11th selection
items.summary: Six Baltimore Ravens, Denver Broncos, San Francisco 49ers and Seattle Seahawks were selected for the NFL's Pro Bowl Games.

items.title: Reijnders kijkt zijn ogen uit: 'Die cijfers van Haaland slaan nergens op'
items.summary: Sinds Tijjani Reijnders deze zomer bij Manchester City neerstreek, kreeg hij te maken met het fenomeen Erling Haaland. In het Kerstnummer van VI kijkt de Oranje-international naar de doelpuntenmachine.

items.title: Chelsea enter hunt for Â£65m Antoine Semenyo with inquiry about his terms
items.summary: Bournemouth winger has release clause in January Liverpool and Manchester City also interested Chelsea have made an inquiry about signing Antoine Semenyo from Bournemouth. The wingerâ€™s deal contains a Â£65m release clause in January and he is also a target for Liverpool, Manchester City and Manchester United. Chelsea were not regarded as a likely destination for Semenyo but have contacted the playerâ€™s camp to explore the conditions of a deal. There is optimism at Stamford Bridge that the Ghana international will be interested in joining. Chelsea hope Semenyo, who is from London, will appreciate their long-term project and see an opportunity to make an immediate impact at a top club. Continue reading...

items.title: PSV drukt stevige stempel op VI-dreamteam eerste seizoenshelft
items.summary: Met vijf spelers is PSV de hofleverancier van het VI Elftal van de Eerste Seizoenshelft. De Eindhovenaren zijn vooralsnog oppermachtig in de Eredivisie.

items.title: Opmerkelijk tafereel tijdens Afrika Cup: fans mogen gratis naar binnen
items.summary: De Afrika Cup-organisatie heeft maandagavond een opvallend besluit genomen tijdens het duel tussen Egypte en Zimbabwe. In Stade Adrar, dat plaats biedt voor 45.000 toeschouwers, zaten bij de aftrap maar enkele honderden fans op de tribune. De wedstrijd eindigde met een veel gevulder stadion. Waarom? De poorten van het stadion waren opengezet, waardoor supporters gratis naar binnen konden.

items.title: RÃ¶hl: Rangers need winning run to have title race chance
items.summary: Rangers head coach Danny RÃ¶hl believes his side can still "have a chance" in the Scottish Premiership title race, despite falling 12 points behind league leaders Hearts.

items.title: â€˜Weâ€™ve fallen behindâ€™: why Germanyâ€™s biggest teams have split from DFB
items.summary: Ownership of Frauen-Bundesliga is being taken over by the clubs, who want to keep pace with game in England â€œThe reason we started this whole process was a fear of losing more and more the connection to the top,â€ says Katharina Kiel, the head of womenâ€™s football at Eintracht Frankfurt. Alongside her role at one of Germanyâ€™s more successful womenâ€™s football teams, Kiel was this month elected president of the new Womenâ€™s Bundesliga Association, after all 14 clubs agreed to split from the German Football Federation (DFB) and form their own committee to take ownership of the league to further commercialise and grow it, with the 2027-28 campaign a targeted start date. Continue reading...

items.title: ECB 'establishing facts' about Duckett video amid drinking culture claims
items.summary: The England and Wales Cricket Board says they are "establishing the facts" after a video posted on social media appeared to show a drunken Ben Duckett slurring his words.

items.title: Chelsea are using Strasbourg as a 'farm team' -- is this the new blueprint for top clubs?
items.summary: Strasbourg now exists as a training ground for Chelsea prospects, akin to baseball's farm system. Is this the future of European soccer?
